author: Sefy Levy
description: Evaluate slag fluidity and desulfurization potential using the V-ratio
reference: Ternary Phase Diagrams in Metallurgy; Mills, 2011

classifications.name: HIGHLY BASIC (V > 1.2)
classifications.description: High desulfurization capacity; low viscosity at process temperature

classifications.name: NEUTRAL / FLUXED (V 1.0 - 1.2)
classifications.description: Optimal balance for furnace refractory protection

classifications.name: ACIDIC SLAG (V 0.5 - 1.0)
classifications.description: Viscous slag; likely requires additional fluxing agents

classifications.name: HIGHLY SILICEOUS / GLASSY (V < 0.5)
classifications.description: Extremely viscous; potential for furnace tapping issues

classifications.name: DATA INCOMPLETE
classifications.description: Missing major oxide components for basicity calculation
